meanings.definition: The act of arranging or negotiating a deal or agreement.
meanings.sent1: She was in charge of the broking for the new partnership.
meanings.sent2: The broking between the two companies went smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The broking of the contract was so efficient, it was like magic!
meanings.sent4: His skill in broking deals was like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The broking process was as intricate as a spider weaving its web.

meanings.definition: The business of acting as an intermediary between parties in a transaction.
meanings.sent1: The company specialized in broking services for international clients.
meanings.sent2: He decided to pursue a career in broking after studying finance.
meanings.sent3: The broking business was so busy, it felt like a non-stop party!
meanings.sent4: She saw the world of broking as a bridge connecting different worlds.
meanings.sent5: The art of broking was as delicate as a tightrope walker's balance.
